title: 2013 World Snooker Championship
summary: The 2013 World Snooker Championship (also called as the 2013 Betfair World Snooker Championship for the purposes of sponsorship) was a professional snooker tournament that took place from 20 April to 6 May 2013 at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. It was the 37th consecutive year the Crucible had hosted the World Snooker Championship; the 2013 event was  last ranking tournament of the 2012–13 snooker season. Sports betting company Betfair sponsored the event for the first time.
